LanguageData.JRWPsittacosaurusReconstruct.label: Psittacosaurus
LanguageData.JRWPsittacosaurusReconstruct.description:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #06456-1923 [PSITTACOSAURUS MONGOLIENSIS] CODENAME: MACAW >449
A small, early ceratopsian with a robust, strong beak. Obligate bipeds, these unique herbivores can run for long periods at a time to escape their predators. Often gregarious, they move in herds across the land, making their home in dense woodlands.
